properties.name: redlog.writer.mongo.collection-name-prefix
properties.description: define the prefix for collection used by red-log

properties.name: redlog.writer.mongo.url
properties.description: define connection string to connect to mongo where store reports

properties.name: redlog.writer.mongo.username
properties.description: define username if required to connect to mongo

properties.name: redlog.writer.mongo.password
properties.description: define password if required to connect to mongo
